sourcesContent:
Chat Multi-IA

{{ aviso }}
{{ resposta }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ChatGptService } from './chat-gpt.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-chat-gpt', templateUrl: './chat-gpt.component.html', styleUrls: ['./chat-gpt.component.css'] }) export class ChatGptComponent implements OnInit { prompt: string = ''; resposta: string = ''; selectedAI: string = 'gemini'; availableAIs: string[] = ['gpt', 'deepseek', 'gemini']; loading: boolean = false; aviso: string = ''; constructor(private chatService: ChatGptService) { } ngOnInit(): void { } enviarPrompt(): void { if (!this.prompt) return; this.loading = true; this.aviso = ''; this.chatService.sendPrompt(this.prompt, this.selectedAI).subscribe({ next: (res: any) => { this.resposta = res.resposta; this.loading = false; }, error: (err: any) => { this.aviso = err.error?.erro || 'Ocorreu um erro ao processar sua solicitação.'; this.loading = false; } }); } }
